## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> whether an option is valid.

The steps for adding and enabling a new ilist option include: 
<ul>
<li>define the option, ilist&#95;foo&lt;Bar&gt;, above;</li>
<li>add new parameters for Bar to <em><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ilist-detail/node-options">ilist&#95;detail::node&#95;options</a></em>;</li>
<li>add an extraction meta-function, ilist&#95;detail::extract&#95;foo;</li>
<li>call extract&#95;foo from <em><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ilist-detail/compute-node-options">ilist&#95;detail::compute&#95;node&#95;options</a></em> and pass it into <em><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ilist-detail/node-options">ilist&#95;detail::node&#95;options</a></em>; and</li>
<li>specialize <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ilist-detail/is-valid-option">is&#95;valid&#95;option&lt;ilist&#95;foo&lt;Bar&gt;&gt;</a></code> to inherit from <code>std::true&#95;type</code> to get static assertions passing in <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simple-ilist">simple&#95;ilist</a></em> and <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node">ilist&#95;node</a></em>.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line 75 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/ilist-node-options-h">ilist&#95;node&#95;options.h</a>.

</DoxygenPage>
